review: It's only $28, so complaining is not an option.  It can only get better.  You can download software that lets you send your desktop and even movies from your computer to your TV.  Sound on streaming video is slightly off and there is a slightly noticeable stuttering to the video (my computer is fast) but it is watchable.  One issue to be aware of is that you need to be sure your TV set or cable is well shielded.  I currently have to power down the device when I want to watch TV.  The always-on wireless signal interferes with the cable signal.  Not so convenient, but I will be picking up some new cable that advertises better shielding to see if that helps.
